title: What tilts you the most?
body: Game just randomly crashed in the middle of last team baron fight, we lost

replies.body: Running out of mana vs champ that uses no mana
Veigar support roaming to my lane not to try and gank, just to steal cs and leave.

"Omg Zed why are you attacking the inhibitor? I am tanking the team for you! Take them out!"     - Galio 2017

Btw I did get the inhib and we proceeded to win on the next push. Guess it's people who don't understand objectives that gets me.
Game balance. If there was any
When I or a teammate dies or an enemy gets away simply because someone wanted to farm a lane rather than listen to some pings and come down river to head them off.
Fatal misclicks, having my fingers on the wrong keys, running out of mana right before the final blow, them escaping with 1 health, etc.

Oh also,

COMPLETELY missing your R as {{champion:420}}. It hits no one, you cant land a W, it just makes you want to kys and youre instantly tilted.

DC's in lanephase botlane. Nothing worse than coming back as a level 1 Ashe and then immediately getting all-inned by Draven Leona as you go for your first CS
__________________________________-
[Poll: Do you run Flash on D or F?](http://stepbystepguides.org/poll-run-flash-d-f/)
When my team doesnt listen the first time, then keep making the same mistakes 6 times in a row.
